amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, Legal Activities by $866,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses, Legal Activities by $866,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Fleming.
